parameters.name: DbNameList
parameters.description: The name of the database. Separate multiple database names with commas (,).

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. Set this parameter to a UNIX timestamp representing the number of milliseconds that have elapsed since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the database instance.

parameters.name: PageNo
parameters.description: The page number. The value must be an integer that is greater than 0. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. The value must be an integer that is greater than 0. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: QueryHash
parameters.description: The hash value of the SQL statement. The hash values of SQL statements of the same type are the same.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. This value is a UNIX timestamp representing the number of milliseconds that have elapsed since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.
